short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: copy any image as ascii so you can send them as text

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Transform any image into beautiful ASCII art with just a right-click! This extension lets you convert images to various ASCII art styles, perfect for sharing on forums, Reddit, Discord, WhatsApp, or any text-based platform.
Key Features:

Instant conversion with right-click menu
8 different ASCII styles:

Classic ASCII (@%#*+=-:.)
Braille patterns (⠁⠂⠃)
Block characters (█▓▒░)
Simple shades (█▄▀)
Detailed shades (@$#0%=+*:-.)
Dot patterns (●○•°)
Minimal lines (┃━┗┓┏┛)
Special symbols (♠♣♥♦)


Customizable settings:

Adjust output resolution
Control line height
Preserve aspect ratio
Perfect for different platforms


Features:

Copy with right-click
Convert from clipboard
Conversion history
Custom settings panel
Cross-platform compatible



Perfect for:

Creating forum signatures
Sharing art on Reddit
Discord messages
WhatsApp conversations
Text-based art communities
ASCII art enthusiasts
Creative coding projects

How to use:

Right-click any image on the web
Select "Copy as ASCII" and choose your style
Paste the ASCII art anywhere!

Or use the popup interface to:

Convert images from your device
Adjust conversion settings
View conversion history
Try different ASCII styles

Privacy & Permissions:

No data collection
Works offline
Only processes images you select
No external server communication

Free and open for everyone to use. Convert your images to ASCII art and share them anywhere text is accepted!
